typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as short,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as short,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfo1
source(output(
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as short,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfo2
EmpInfo2 keyGenerate(output(EmpID as long),
	startAt: 7L) ~> EmpID
EmpInfo1, EmpID union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['EmpInfoUnion.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmpInfo
